FuncDef: The reset mtrace statistics command clears MTrace message statistics.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before running the display mtrace statistics command to collect MTrace message statistics generated in a certain period, run the reset mtrace statistics command to clear the original statistics. This ensures that the statistics collected are correct.
Configuration Impact
After the reset mtrace statistics command is run, the statistics cleared cannot be restored.
Precautions
The reset mtrace statistics command clears all MTrace message statistics.
